name: Shadow Rush
description:
- Built with Unity

- All textures are fully custom made

- All sound effects are custom made, however the songs heard when racing and on the menu are:

    - Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio - Rain City
    - z3r0 - 8but Syndrome   

- We made a custom map editor and it is available here. Try your own maps or join our Discord to share your best maps and times on them! Just take the text in the text area and paste it in the custom level import in the game

Controls

RightTrigger or Up arrow for gas

LeftTrigger or Down for break

Left Analog stick and Left/Right Arrows for steering

A button and LeftShift to Dash

X button and Spacebar to break/drift


See https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/$283730 for a more extensive description!
